All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Artist
Artist This class represents an artist entity in the virtual art gallery system.
Artwork
Artwork This class represents an artwork entity in the virtual art gallery system.
ArtworkNotFoundException
 
ArtworkTestCases
Test class for Artwork functionality in the VirtualArtGalleryImpl class.
DbConnection
Utility class for managing database connections.
Gallery
Gallery This class represents a gallery entity in the virtual art gallery system.
GalleryTestCases
This JUnit test class tests functionalities related to managing gallery data in the virtual art gallery system.
IVirtualArtGallery
Interface defining methods for interacting with the virtual art gallery system.
Main
Main class to demonstrate functionality related to artwork and galleries.
User
User This class represents a user entity in the virtual art gallery system.
UserFavoriteArtwork
UserFavoriteArtwork This class represents a many-to-many relationship between users and artworks in the virtual art gallery system.
UserNotFoundException
UserNotFoundException This exception is thrown when a user with the specified ID is not found in the system.
VirtualArtGalleryImpl
VirtualArtGalleryImpl This class implements the IVirtualArtGallery interface, providing methods to interact with the virtual art gallery database.
